functions.tag: {CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:7b,Amplifier:7b,Duration:1,ShowParticles:0b}],CustomPotionColor:4227200,display:{Name:'[{"translate":"穢れの矢","color":"#209F9F","bold":true,"italic":false},{"translate":"Lv3","color":"#FFFF00","bold":true,"italic":false}]',Lore:['{"translate":"生物に対しダメージを与え","color":"#CCCCCC","italic":false}','{"translate":"それ以外のものを癒す","color":"#CCCCCC","italic":false}','{"translate":"Lv2よりも効果がまたさらに大きく改善したが","color":"#CCCCCC","italic":false}','{"translate":"量産できない非売品となった","color":"#CCCCCC","italic":false}']}}
